languages.text: "Приветственная пуля в лоб по прибытии на ваш флагман полагается? Нет, так не пойдет".
"And will I receive a complimentary bullet to the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."
languages.original_text: "Приветственная пуля в лоб по прибытии на ваш флагман полагается? Нет, так не пойдет".

traits.locale_text: "Will there be a complimentary bullet in the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."
"Will there be a complimentary bullet in the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."
"And will I receive a complimentary bullet in the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."
"And will I receive a complimentary bullet in the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."
"And will I receive a complimentary bullet to the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."
"And will I receive a complimentary bullet to the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."

languages.text: «¿Y recibir una bala en la frente como regalo de llegada a su nave? No, no puedo aceptarlo».
languages.original_text: "And will I receive a complimentary bullet to the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y recibir una bala en la frente como regalo de llegada a su nave? No, no puedo aceptarlo».

languages.text: “是啊，等我上了你的船之后，会不会有人朝我的头上来颗子弹当做礼物？不，这可不行。”
languages.original_text: "And will I receive a complimentary bullet to the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，等我上了你的船之后，会不会有人朝我的头上来颗子弹当做礼物？不，这可不行。”

languages.text: 「それで、私があなたの旗艦に乗った瞬間、額にお祝いの弾丸をもらうってわけですね？その手には乗りませんわ」
languages.original_text: "And will I receive a complimentary bullet to the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."

traits.locale_text: 「それで、私があなたの旗艦に乗った瞬間、額にお祝いの弾丸をもらうってわけですね？その手には乗りませんわ」

languages.text: « Pour avoir droit à une balle dans la tête à mon arrivée sur votre vaisseau amiral ? Non, c'est hors de question. »
languages.original_text: "And will I receive a complimentary bullet to the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."

traits.locale_text: « Pour avoir droit à une balle dans la tête à mon arrivée sur votre vaisseau amiral ? Non, c'est hors de question. »

languages.text: "Sancak gemine girdiğimiz sırada 'ikram' olarak alnımın ortasına kurşun da yiyecek miyim? Kalsın."
languages.original_text: "And will I receive a complimentary bullet to the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."

traits.locale_text: "Sancak gemine girdiğimiz sırada 'ikram' olarak alnımın ortasına kurşun da yiyecek miyim? Kalsın."

languages.text: "Um bei meiner Ankunft auf Eurem Flaggschiff mit einer Kugel im Kopf begrüßt zu werden? Nein, das könnt Ihr vergessen."
languages.original_text: "And will I receive a complimentary bullet to the forehead upon arrival on your flagship? No, this will not do."

traits.locale_text: "Um bei meiner Ankunft auf Eurem Flaggschiff mit einer Kugel im Kopf begrüßt zu werden? Nein, das könnt Ihr vergessen."
